name: ERezeptWorkflowEU
title: E-Rezept Workflow EU
description: Dieser IG Beschreibt Datenmodelle f√ºr den E-Rezept-Fachdienst mit dem NCPeH Deutschland

resource.name: CodeSystem of NCPeH Request Types
resource.description: Type of Request from NCPeH

resource.name: CodeSystem of types for a consent
resource.description: Type of patient consent.

resource.name: Consent for ePrescriptions
resource.description: Records the consent of the patient for an operation in the context of ePrescription.

resource.name: Dispensation of the Prescription from the EU
resource.description: Handles information about the redeem of the prescription and the submited medication from the EU.

resource.name: Dispense Data from EU
resource.description: Logical Information that is Provided in the dispensation document by the NCPeH of country B for Dispensing Medication

resource.name: EU-Medication
resource.description: Medication of a Prescription or Dispensation from the EU

resource.name: EUCloseOperation
resource.description: The operation $close finishes the e-prescription workflow and creates a receipt. The Output of this operation is a signed Bundle, to be used for further financial processing. The status of the Task then changes into #completed

resource.name: Example for a Bundle with a Consent
Example for a Consent to redeem EU Prescritptions
Example Medication Dispense
resource.description: Example of a Medication Dispense.

resource.name: Example-EU-Organization
resource.description: Example of an EU Organization

resource.name: Example-EU-Practitioner
resource.description: Example of an EU Practitioner

resource.name: Example-EU-PractitionerRole
resource.description: Example of an EU PractitionerRole

resource.name: GEM ERP PR EU CloseOperation Input
resource.description: This profile defines the parameters for receiving dispense information for a prescription that was redeemed in the EU

resource.name: GEM ERPEU PR PAR Access Authorization Request
resource.description: Displays Parameters for EU Access Authorization

resource.name: GEM ERPEU PR PAR Access Authorization Response
resource.description: Displays Response Parameters for EU Access Authorization

resource.name: GEM ERPEU PR PAR GET Prescription Input
resource.description: This profile defines the parameters for receiving dispense information for a prescription that was redeemed in the EU

resource.name: GEM ERPEU PR PAR GET Prescription Output
resource.description: This profile defines the output parameters for the Get Prescription Operation

resource.name: GEM ERPEU PR PAR PATCH Task Input
resource.description: This profile defines the parameters for patching the Task to mark the prescription as to-be-redeemed in the EU

resource.name: GEM_ERPEU_EX_MedicinalPackageDescription
resource.description: Description of a packaged medicinal product.

resource.name: GEM_ERPEU_EX_MedicinalPackageIdentifier
resource.description: Identifier of a packaged medicinal product refers to a specific pack size of a specific product.

resource.name: GET-Prescription-EU
resource.description: The Operation gets Presciption Information from the ERP System for usage in the e-prescription workflow for EU countries

resource.name: Grant-EU-Access-Permission
resource.description: This operation receives the access code and the country that the patient wants to grant access to. The operation validates the country and creates registeres the Access Code.

resource.name: Identifier Profile for EU AccessCode
resource.description: The AccessCode that is generated by the FdV in order to access the ePrescription in an EU country.

resource.name: Medication Without code or system for Strength
Medication Without code or system for Strength
Organization Information Received from the EU
resource.description: This Organization Profile is sent by the NCPeH when redeeming a Prescription in the EU

resource.name: Practitioner Information Received from the EU
resource.description: This Practitioner Profile is sent by the NCPeH when redeeming a Prescription in the EU

resource.name: PractitionerRole Information Received from the EU
resource.description: This PractitionerRole Profile is sent by the NCPeH when redeeming a Prescription in the EU

resource.name: Read-EU-Access-Permission
resource.description: This operation reads the currenty in the E-Rezept-Fachdienst registered Access Code for redeeming ePrescriptions in an EU country.

resource.name: Revoke-EU-Access-Permission
resource.description: This operation revokes the currently registered access code for redeeming prescriptions in an EU country.

resource.name: ValueSet of Consent Codes
resource.description: Type of Consents for the ePrescription.

resource.name: ValueSet of Consent PolyRule Codes
resource.description: Type of Policy Rules for Consents of the ePrescription.

resource.name: ValueSet of NCPeH Request Types
resource.description: Type of Request from NCPeH
